Medium Line RGB 36 Applet

for microEnable IV AD4-CL
for microEnable IV VD4-CL
.

Description
..

The hardware applet Medium Line RGB 36 enables the operation of a color scale camera. Supported are all color line-scan cameras in the Medium Configuration of the CameraLink standard and a resolution of up to 16,384 x 65,535 pixels.


Highlights
.
  • Support of all RGB CameraLink input formats (Medium RGB30/RGB36)
  • Transfer rate of up to 490MB/s on quad line PCIe systems
  • On-board 1D Shading correction, which adjusts offset and gain for each pixel seperately to rectify inherent disortions from the sensor and/or illumination
  • Knee Lookup Table for piecewise linear conversion from 16 bit/pixel to 16 bit/pixel.
  • Basic image processing, e. g. whitebalancing, bightness, contrast and gamma-correction.
  • Highly customizable Trigger System
  • Shaft Encoder A/B support (rovolving direction detection and compensation)
  • Software trigger control
  • Max. image dimension of 16,384 x 65,535 pixel
  • 8bit or 16bit per color component (RGB24/RGB48)
  • Hardware generated image number
  • Regions of Interest support
  • Image selector
  • Latency of a single line
  • Support of RS232 clser interface
  • Camera detection abilities
  • DigI/O
  • CC signals
  • Miscellaneous
.


References
.

SDK Documentation
.
